item.title: [Python] How to save image feature point information in a file and use it for matching
item.description: ## Introduction I often use OpenCV feature point extraction and matching, When using multiple images, feature point extraction often took time. Therefore, this time, I made a program that outputs feature point information to a file and uses it for matching. As an example, let’s find the girl with red glasses (target image) from the girls (12 source images) this time!
